name: Root For Your Champ
description:
Whisper/talk/yell into the microphone to set the levels for each of the phases in the arm wrestling competition and then match that level when that phase comes up during the competition.

Created in two days during the Global Game Jam 2023 in collaboration with:

  • Charlie Chao (bongbonggun)
  • 傅蓉 Fù Róng
  • Ilya Fedotov (stigiec)
  • Josm Ople
  • Richmond Manga
